attributes.action: Immediately introduce annual PSA screening for Prostate Cancer for men aged 50 and over
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The evidence is overwhelming that a regular simple blood test for PSA can identify early those men at high risk of prostate cancer and particularly before symptoms are recognised. Early identification means longer life.
In America, where PSA screening has to be paid for, the death rate from prostate cancer has dropped to one in six. In UK it is 9000 deaths from 30,000 case diagnosed per year.
regular testing would highlight the rate of change of PSA - the key indicator to aggressive or benign prostate cancer. Don't believe the enemies of preventive screening, sieze the opportunity and sign up today before it is too late!
